root.message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 14-4-1, translated into all languages

languages.language:
Rationale:

The indicator measure the sustainability of fish resources based on two major considerations: yield and reproduction. When a stock is fished biologically sustainable, it produces good yield without impairing the stock's reproductivity, reaching a good balance between human use and ecological conservation.

The proportion is just calculated based on stock numbers, without weighting either by its production volume or stock abundance, that is every fish stock is considered of the same importance.
